__TOC__


The Bug Squad team has regular weekly meetings on Wednesdays at 18:00 UTC in '''#ubuntu-meeting'''. Feel free to join in! 

=== Next meeting ===

==== When ====
Next meeting will be April 4 at 1800 UTC. 

Next <nowiki>[[QATeam-Meetings-Chairing|chair]]</nowiki> will be '''bdmurray'''.

{i} Docs on how to chair the QA Team Weekly Meeting (including copy & paste snippets) can be found <nowiki>[[QATeam-Meetings-Chairing|here]]</nowiki>.

==== Agenda ====

* Previous Actions (all)
** mfisch to create a Standard Response for subscription of a team to a bug (DONE)
* Engineering Team Bug Status
* Bug Escalations (any High or Critical bugs that community members have seen that need attention)
* Other Topics
